step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you raise them.
You're spreading your elbows well. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoid pulling your hands forward.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your shoulders relaxed.
You held the position well. Remember to breathe deeply during the hold.
Great job reversing the motion. Ensure a smooth return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Continue to focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding pulling forward.
